content:
I believe we have a few issues that simply need to be turned into prose. Should we collect these and blast out a call on social media for volunteers? Here's a rough list:

  • Footgun with futures unordered (https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async-foundations/issues/131)
  • processing urls in batches (https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async-foundations/issues/113)
  • sync and/or async I/O-related library (https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async-foundations/issues/49)
  • consumer async libraries and too many choices (https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async-foundations/issues/112)

There are others but they seem less well formed than these.
